title: Egg Devaux
directions: Separate the egg yolk from the white
In a large mixing bowl, add a few drops of lemon juice and salt to the whites and whisk until liquidy foam (not a hard foam)
Grease a ring mold and place on a heated pan
Fill the ring mold 1/4 way with egg white mixture
Cover the yolk and fill the ring mold the rest of the way with egg white mixture
Use a knife to release the edges
Serve on an english muffin with lox and top with hollandaise
